altername_name: Marie-Antoinette et les Desciples de Loki
name: Marie-Antoinette and the Disciples of Loki
overview: Marie Antoinette and the Disciples of Loki is an adventure game about DS. The story takes place in 1787, when a mysterious murder has just been committed at Versailles. The player must conduct the investigation by meeting historical figures and solving different puzzles (puzzles, puzzles, carriage races).
